reasoningText.text:

2. Finding and examining the pom.xml file

Let's start!

The issue is that in Spring Boot 2.7, the default behavior changed for script-based initialization. We need to configure JPA to defer the data source initialization. Let me update the application.yml:

input.new_str:
spring:
  main:
    banner-mode: "off"
    allow-bean-definition-overriding: true
  h2.console.enabled: true
  jpa:
    # Disabled since a filter is declared programmatically
    open-in-view: false
    show-sql: true
    defer-datasource-initialization: true

Aha! The graphql-java-kickstart 15.0.0 requires Jakarta EE (jakarta.servlet.Servlet) which is used in Spring Boot 3.x, but we're using Spring Boot 2.7.x which still uses javax.servlet. Version 15.0.0 is for Spring Boot 3.x. Let me use version 14.1.0 which should be the last version for Spring Boot 2.x:

    date: Date!

    name: String!

    books: [Book]
}

    authors: [Author]

    editors: [Editor]
}
